articles.description: Losses in Chinese assets are mounting again as Beijing’s modest stimulus disheartens investors.
articles.content:
Losses in Chinese assets are mounting again as Beijing’s modest stimulus disheartens investors. 
The Hang Seng China Enterprises Index of Hong Kong-listed Chinese companies gauge slumped more than 6… [+260 chars]
